00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/

00031 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples

00034

00040   * @{
00041   */
00042 
00043 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00044 void DAC_Configuration(void);
00045 
00046 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define R_CHANNEL_OUT_MILLI_V        (1650)       /* 1.65v                                                  */
00048 #define L_CHANNEL_OUT_MILLI_V        (1100)       /* 1.10v                                                  */
00049 
00050 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 #define R_CHANNEL_CONV_DATA          ((R_CHANNEL_OUT_MILLI_V * 65535)/3300)
00052 #define L_CHANNEL_CONV_DATA          ((L_CHANNEL_OUT_MILLI_V * 65535)/3300)
00053 
00054 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00055 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00056   * @brief  Main program.
00057   * @retval None
00058   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00059 int main(void)
00060 {
00061   DAC_Configuration();
00062 
00063   while (1);
00064 }
00065 
00066 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00067   * @brief  Audio DAC Configuration.
00068   * @retval None
00069   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00070 void DAC_Configuration(void)
00071 {
00072   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00073   /* Enable peripherals clocks of DAC, AFIO                                                                 */
00074   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO       = 1;
00075   CKCUClock.Bit.DAC0       = 1;
00076   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00077 
00078   /* Config AFIO mode as DAC function                                                                       */
00079   AFIO_GPxConfig(GPIO_PC, AFIO_PIN_1, AFIO_FUN_DAC0);     /* PC1 set as R-channel Output                    */
00080   AFIO_GPxConfig(GPIO_PC, AFIO_PIN_2, AFIO_FUN_DAC0);     /* PC2 set as L-channel Output                    */
00081 
00082   /* DAC data from software                                                                                 */
00083   DACD16_DataSourceConfig(HT_DACDUAL16, DAC_CH_R, DATA_FROM_UC);     /* R-channel's Data from software      */
00084   DACD16_DataSourceConfig(HT_DACDUAL16, DAC_CH_L, DATA_FROM_UC);     /* L-channel's Data from software      */
00085 
00086   /* Set DAC Data                                                                                           */
00087   DACD16_SetChannelData(HT_DACDUAL16, DAC_CH_R, R_CHANNEL_CONV_DATA);     /* R-channel Ouput 3.3v/2 = 1.65v */
00088   DACD16_SetChannelData(HT_DACDUAL16, DAC_CH_L, L_CHANNEL_CONV_DATA);     /* L-channel Ouput 3.3v/3 = 1.1v  */
00089 
00090   /* Start conversion                                                                                       */
00091   DACD16_SoftwareStartConvCmd(HT_DACDUAL16, DAC_CH_R);
00092   DACD16_SoftwareStartConvCmd(HT_DACDUAL16, DAC_CH_L);
00093 }
00094 
00095 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)

00104   /*
00105      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00106      Debug message can be added here.
00107   */
00108 
00109   while (1)
00110   {
00111   }
00112 }
